error.message: Usage of deprecated trait Drupal\field\Tests\EntityReference\EntityReferenceTestTrait in class Drupal\Tests\migrate_drupal_d8\Kernel\ContentEntityTest. Deprecated in drupal:8.6.2 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use Drupal\Tests\field\Traits\EntityReferenceTestTrait instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to migrate_drupal_d8.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
A drupal/core requirement is not present in composer.json. Having a composer.json is not a requirement for Drupal 9 compatibility but if there is one, it should include a drupal/core requirement.
